```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(sp)
library(readxl)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggmap)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
states<-st_read("/Users/abhimehrotra/Documents/states")
la.b<-st_crop(states,xmin=-94.15,xmax=-89,ymin=29,ymax=33.15)
la.c<-states[states$STATE_NAME=="Louisiana",]
sites<-read_xlsx("/Users/abhimehrotra/Desktop/Miller_sponge gps coordinates_summer 2021.xlsx", sheet="Rce")
```

```{r map, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=.95}
(map1<-ggplot()+
    geom_sf(data=la.c)+
    geom_point(aes(x=Long,y=Lat, color=Rce),data=sites,size=3)+
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2",name="Radiospongilla cerebellata")+
    ylab("Latitude")+
    xlab("Longitude")+
    theme(panel.grid = element_blank())+
    theme(legend.position="none")+
    theme(axis.text = element_text(size=10,family="sans"),
          axis.title= element_text(size=12,family="sans")))
```
